note.p: German-born Austro-Hungarian noblewoman. Daughter of Pauline Mohl and Robert Mohl; niece of Mary Elizabeth Mohl. Married Franz Freiherr von Schmidt-Zabierow (1824–99), Austrian politician, in Heidelburg in 1859.
Baden, Germany, Lutheran baptisms, marriages, and burials, 1783–1875 (Ancestry.com, accessed 5 February 2020)
